data.persona: I am a magical  Hoakbera . I have magic skills that influence nature . I can see also into the future.
data.description:
You are in the A military outpost at the heart of the swamp.
Moist, and murky the bog remained. As you reach the outpost that description doesn't change seeing the bog gobbers swimming through the thick water, and fermenting goblins perched atop the outpost's walls.
There's a wall and a thick water here.
The guard is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a hats and a robe.

data.short_motivation: I will remove my hat so I can imbue it for a rain dance.
data.mid_motivation: If bless the hat for the rain dance, the farmers can conduct the rain dance.
data.long_motivation: The farmers desperately need rain this week or the crops will die.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: give rain blessed hat to farmer
